entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:08 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this morning. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
